text.author: Marcie Rickenbacker
text.summary: On Jan. 10, 1970, Marcie writes to her mum worrying about acceptance to colleges, for which she needs two more $15 checks for Wesleyan and Syracuse, telling her about a family picture she made for creative days with her camera, and discussing her expenses, for which she asks for $20-25 a month.
text.summary2: Marcie writes to her mother concerning her financial and academic concerns and the extra-curricular events of both the previous few days and the following months, including creative days, monthly expenses, and school acceptances.
text.title: Letter home, Marcie Rickenbacker, Abbot Academy, Class of 1970
